imdb.plot outline: Love swimming teenager Lin Feng has a warm home, and my father loved my mother Xianghai Ye Qing, Lin Yu-brother cute dreams of becoming a boxer, a four and jolly. Suddenly one day, his mother Ye Lin secretly left the house, from the unknown. Xianghai personality change, not to find the whereabouts of his wife of two brothers indifferent. Lam Fung bent find the missing mother, the opportunity to get to know a coincidence Soviet gymnast Xiao Ke, Su Lin Feng small can not only help find the mother, but also to help Lam Fung added sports team to become a swimmer; his brother in the rain forest after the mother of the missing father he suddenly cold, became belligerent, bent to justify their existence in the boxing ring. An old newspaper to Lin Feng, Lin Yu, Su small can roll into a generation of dusty scores! I'm struggling to find the mother of the wind actually caught in his cell; he was found in the rain forest and the Soviet Union, but small half-siblings; Su Xiao Ke had recovered the lost childhood memories. Lin Feng in order to resolve two generations of both good and bad, all at the expense of their own, and finally regain a warm home
